title: Lesson 19
paragraph: Language and translation involve clarity, courtesy, and urgency. Translating accurately, granting rights, and considering chemical and environmental context ensures meaningful communication.

words.meaning: to express words or text in another language
words.example: He translated the document into Japanese.
The media was accused of biasing the report.
The crops suffered due to drought.
He thanked her out of courtesy.

words.meaning: a substance with a defined composition
words.example: The laboratory stores dangerous chemicals carefully.
She read the entire book in one day.

words.meaning: a manner of doing something or style
words.example: The dress was made in the latest fashion.

words.meaning: able to be granted or allowed
words.example: Permissions are grantable by the administrator.

words.meaning: the area near or surrounding a place
words.example: There are several shops in the vicinity.
